contentrichtext.text: In [[Welsh mythology]], '''Murigen''' was a goddess of [[lake]]s, and associated with flooding.<ref>Sykes, Egerton and Kendall, Alan (2002 ed.) ''Who's Who in Non-Classical Mythology'' Routledge, New York, p. 133.</ref> She is also known as '''Morgan''', probably a specific personification of [[morgens]], the [[Welsh language|Welsh]] term for [[water sprite]]s.<ref>Franklin, Anna (2002) ''The Illustrated Encyclopaedia Of Fairies'' Vega, London, p. 182.</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==See also== [[Morgan le Fay]] {{celt-myth-stub}} [[Category:Welsh goddesses]] [[Category:Sea and river goddesses]]
